#include <stdio.h>

int main() {
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--) {
		long long n, k, ans=0, l=9, p, q, a, b, c, i, j;
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
		i=1;
		c=0;
		while(1) {
			c+=l*i;
			if(c>k)
				break;
			i++;
			l*=10;
		}
		c-=l*i;
		k-=c;
		for(j=1;j<i;j++)
			ans=ans*10+9;
//		printf("%lld %lld %lld %lld\n",i,c,k,ans);
		ans+=k/i;
		if(k%i) {
			ans++;
			k=k%i;
			for(j=0;j<i-k;j++)
				ans=ans/10;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans%10);
	}
}
